description: On this sweater, our beloved mascot contrasts a polished blazer and cricket sweater with rugged patchwork jeans. Our founder's initials are embroidered by hand at the left hem.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 29.5" body length (front and back), a 19.5" shoulder, a 54" chest, and a 25.75" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 0.5" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 30.75" body length (front and back), a 19.5" shoulder, a 54" chest, and a 27.5" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 0.5" between sizes.
Polo Bear intarsia-knit and embroidered at the center front.
Rib-knit hem. "RL" hand-embroidered at the left hem.
